languages.text: {n}Кассия отворачивается, прикрыв шалью глаза и нос.{/n} "Этот запах, эти крики... Вам стоило пресечь сие варварство, Лорд-капитан. Не потакать ему".
languages.translation_comment: если НЕ превалирует каунтер CassiaHatred или Freedom

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Ох!" {n}Кассия спешно прикрывает глаза дрожащими руками.{/n} "Пожалуйста, скажите, когда все это закончится..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.translation_comment: если НЕ превалирует каунтер CassiaHatred или Freedom

languages.text: {n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия отворачивается, прикрыв шалью глаза и нос.{/n} "Этот запах, эти крики... Вам стоило пресечь сие варварство, Лорд-капитан. Не потакать ему".

{n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."

languages.text: {n}Cassia wendet sich ab und bedeckt Augen und Nase mit einem Tuch.{/n} "Dieser Geruch, diese Schreie ... Es würde Euch geziemen, dieser Barbarei ein Ende zu bereiten, Lord Captain, nicht, mehr davon anzuregen."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia wendet sich ab und bedeckt Augen und Nase mit einem Tuch.{/n} "Dieser Geruch, diese Schreie ... Es würde Euch geziemen, dieser Barbarei ein Ende zu bereiten, Lord Captain, nicht, mehr davon anzuregen."

languages.text: {n}Cassia se détourne, couvrant ses yeux et son nez d'un châle.{/n} « Cette odeur, ces cris... Plutôt que de l'encourager, il vous incombe de mettre fin à cette barbarie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se détourne, couvrant ses yeux et son nez d'un châle.{/n} « Cette odeur, ces cris... Plutôt que de l'encourager, il vous incombe de mettre fin à cette barbarie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}卡西娅转过了身，用披肩捂住了眼睛和鼻子。{/n}“这样的味道，这些尖叫声……舰长大人，你应当制止这种野蛮行径，不该助长他们的气焰。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅转过了身，用披肩捂住了眼睛和鼻子。{/n}“这样的味道，这些尖叫声……舰长大人，你应当制止这种野蛮行径，不该助长他们的气焰。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia se gira y se cubre ojos y nariz con un chal.{/n} «Este olor, estos gritos... Debería poner fin a esta barbarie, Lord Capitán, no incitarla».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se gira y se cubre ojos y nariz con un chal.{/n} «Este olor, estos gritos... Debería poner fin a esta barbarie, Lord Capitán, no incitarla».

languages.text: {n}カシアはショールで目と鼻を覆いながら背を向けた。{/n}「この臭い、この叫び声…ロード・キャプテン、この野蛮な行為を助長するのではなく、やめさせるのが筋でしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはショールで目と鼻を覆いながら背を向けた。{/n}「この臭い、この叫び声…ロード・キャプテン、この野蛮な行為を助長するのではなく、やめさせるのが筋でしょう」

languages.text: {n}Cassia, arkasını dönerek elleriyle gözlerini ve burnunu bir şalla kapatıyor.{/n} "Bu koku, bu çığlıklar... Sana bu barbarlığı durdurmak yakışır Lord Kaptan, daha fazlasını teşvik etmek değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia turns away, covering her eyes and nose with a shawl.{/n} "This smell, these screams... It would behove you to put a stop to this barbarism, Lord Captain, not encourage more of it."
